data.name: Maid Envy: Delightful Sins
data.detailed_description: It has been a difficult time for Envy lately, stuck on Earth for ages, bored out of her mind and gradually losing her demonic powers. She thought life wouldn't get better again, but then she began to smell the sweet scent of lust on the wind. Following a path of carnal desire she comes across the Maid Café.
data.about_the_game: It has been a difficult time for Envy lately, stuck on Earth for ages, bored out of her mind and gradually losing her demonic powers. She thought life wouldn't get better again, but then she began to smell the sweet scent of lust on the wind. Following a path of carnal desire she comes across the Maid Café.
data.short_description: It has been a difficult time for Envy lately, stuck on Earth for ages, bored out of her mind and gradually losing her demonic powers. She thought life wouldn't get better again, until she begins to smell the sweet scent of lust once more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted within this game are over 18.

The game includes suggestive scenes as well as some partial nudity with characters in their underwear/lingerie or revealing clothing. Romance and Intimacy and some adult language are also included throughout.
